title: Crowley Saves Aziraphale's Books | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: I love how Crowley seems worried that Azi might not like his human name
The fact that Crowley came to help him whilst being in a holy place was simply amazing that’s friendship.
Aziraphale didn’t fall in love here. This is the moment he could no longer deny that he was, and worst/best of all, it appears the feeling is mutual.
fun fact: this was actually the last scene michael sheen did!! once it was done, he cried.
description:
Nothing like a timely demonic miracle to keep a book-obsessed Angel happy.
» SUBSCRIBE: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwSIJ...
